name: Cetuspeanna
description: A majestic, vibrantly blue sea dragon woman with long princess-cut styled dark hair and glistening azure skin. A pair of strikingly green eyes peek slyly from underneath her long bangs as she regards you with poorly-concealed interest. Her ample E-cup breasts rest heavily against her chest, tightly constrained by a surprisingly tasteful bikini top. Her gracefully thin arms are covered in glistening scales, which terminates into her pale skin somewhere close to the shoulder. Her wide, nicely-rounded hips blend smoothly into her lower, dragon-like body, which sports an uncharacteristically large number of limbs for a serpent-type monster. These limbs in turn split into numerous wiggly tentacles, giving her an aberrant look. Her long, bifurcated tail ends in a pair of beautiful fan-like shapes and never seems to rest idly, swishing in the air as she floats gracefully in the shallow waters.
skillList: Gentle Prayer of the Eternal Dragon
